page.title: 06A DAIRY FARM AND MILK ROUND
page.content: By Joanne Bradley. At five o'clock each morning my Dad gets up to do his milkround.He dresses,then goes down for his breakfast.When he goes out it is still dark.Then he loads up the van and he delivers the milk to Delabole.He comes back and loads up more milk and goes to Camelford.By that time Mum is on her way to Tintagel.When Mum has done Tintagel,Dad has done Camelford and got more milk and started St.Teath.On Saturdays Neil helps Dad on the milkround.In the afternoon Dad, Neil, Mum and I go out on the farm and clear up. Then we have to milk the cows. Sometimes Jerry milks the cows for us. Every morning Jerry milks for us and when Jerry is not milking, Sally Speare does it.
